translations.english: In the ninth month, he captured Tu.

translations.chinese: 詔諸侯王視有功者立以為燕王。
translations.english: He commanded the feudal lords to examine those with merit and establish one as King of Yan.

translations.chinese: 荊王臣信等十人皆曰：「太尉長安侯盧綰功最多，請立以為燕王。」
translations.english: King Jing Chen Xin and ten others all said: "Grand Marshal Lord Chang'an Lu Wan has the most merit. Please establish him as King of Yan."
He sent Chancellor Kuai to lead troops and pacify Dai territory.
Li Ji rebelled. The emperor personally attacked and defeated him.
